meanings.definition: Able to be afforded or paid for without causing financial strain.
meanings.sent1: The new store offered affordable clothes for everyone to buy.
meanings.sent2: She found an affordable apartment that fit her budget perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The affordable ice cream made everyone smile without emptying their wallets.
meanings.sent4: His affordable solution to the problem saved the day for the team.
meanings.sent5: The affordable vacation package was like a dream come true for the family.
